thread.section_title: Thinking Capital Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thinking Capital | thinkingcapital.ca
thread.title: Ahmed M.
thread.title_full: Thinking Capital reviewed by Ahmed M.

author: Ahmed M.
title: Ahmed M.
text:
I was sooo skeptic at first, Sacha was great in handling, answering and guaranteeing all my concerns, (33 emails he sent me), he was patient and had the best customer service that i have seen; submitting the application and paper work was so smooth, i got approved the next day and they wired the money on the same day...!!
A month went by since i got the loan and whatever Sacha promised me regarding me paying back the loan from my account was totally accurate, they don't over withdraw my account, they stuck to the agreement.
If they can make me happy they can make anyone happy, i wouldn't hesitate doing business with them again.
